## Inputs

Our Inputs all have the following graphs:

```{r inputs}
max_input <- max(SimulationInputs.df$constant, SimulationInputs.df$incubation, SimulationInputs.df$seasonal, RegimeInputs$'regime shift')

standardize_input_graph.fn <- function(graph){
  
  updated_graph <- graph + 
    theme_minimal() +
    ylim(0,max_input) +
    # labs(x = "Time since start of simulation (years)",
    #      y = "Organic Carbon as a proportion of NPP (kg C per m^2)") + 
    labs(x = "",
         y = "")
    
  return(updated_graph)
}


standardize_input_graph.fn(Constant_Inputs + labs(title="Constant Inputs")) + standardize_input_graph.fn(Incub_Inputs + labs(title="Incubation") + xlim(0,3)) + standardize_input_graph.fn(Seasonal_Inputs+ labs(title="Seasonal Variation") + xlim(0,5)) + standardize_input_graph.fn(Regime_Inputs+ labs(title="Regime Shift")) +                                                    plot_layout(nrow = 1, byrow = FALSE)

```


From the Litter and Soil markdown, we also have simulation graphs:

```{r SimGraphs}
SpinUp_Stocks.gr + 
    labs(title = "Spin-Up Soil Organic C", x="Time (years)", y="kg-C per m^2") + 
SpinUp_Resp.gr + 
    labs(title = "Spin-Up Respiration Rates", x="Time (years)", y="kg-C per m^2 per month") + 
  plot_layout(guides = "collect", axis_titles = "collect")


Incub_Stocks.gr + 
    labs(title = "Incubation Soil Organic C", x="Time (years)", y="kg-C per m^2") + 
Incub_Resp.gr + 
    labs(title = "Incubation Respiration Rates", x="Time (years)", y="kg-C per m^2 per month") + 
  plot_layout(guides = "collect", axis_titles = "collect")



```
